body: This snakeskin belt's buckle is shaped like a serpent's head. The wearer gains a +2 enhancement bonus to Strength and a +2 competence bonus on grapple combat maneuver checks. Treat the enhancement bonus to Strength as temporary ability bonus for the first 24 hours the belt is worn. In addition, the belt grants the wearer the constrict ability for 1d6 points of damage plus the wearer's Strength modifier.
name: Anaconda's Coils
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Belt/Belt Slot Wondrous Items/Anacondas Coils
